Description:
You discover the rubble of an ancient altar. 

These altars were used to make offerings with magic shards to improve skills, but this altar appears to have been destroyed on purpose; perhaps those who did it are still nearby. 

The Whispering Stone seems to react to the broken altar, with the faint murmuring that surrounds it growing louder and more insistent.
DescriptionAction: You feel the urge to place the Whispering Stone upon the altar.

    "ReplyText": "Place the stone on the broken altar.",
    "SSRewardText": "As you place the Whispering Stone atop the ruined altar, the stones and rubble begin to shift and move. Soon, the altar is pristine and perfect, glowing gently in the sun.\n\nThis doesn't last long, though; within seconds, a wave of darkness is expelled from the altar and it crumbles once more, ending up even more destroyed than it started.\n\nThe Whispering Stone seems to be empowered by the destruction it has wrought, and you collect it before continuing on your journey.",
